comment.author: 41909278@N08
comment._content:
Ground glare has obscured the underwing serial beyond EX..., but this is either a Harvard Mk IIA or Mk III, bound for the Royal Air Force. The MkIIA was identical, except for instrumentation, to the AT-6C and the Mk II was identical (except for instrumentation) to the AT-6D. 

Doug MacPhail
